column2: Listen to the podcast of @demishassabis public lecture at @theRSAorg about artificial intelligence & the future:
New robotics paper! Progressive Nets transfer policies from simulation to real robot. Deep RL from pixel to action!
Our 3rd @nature paper, about Differentiable Neural Computers, is available to read online! Take a look:  #DNCpaper
Our 3rd @nature paper! 'Hybrid computing using a neural network with dynamic external memory' #DNCpaper
New paper with @shakir_za, @balajiln: Learning in Implicit Generative Models. Connecting GANs to testing and ratios
Watch #DeepMind’s @demishassabis give the annual @RAEngNews #autumnlecture on our journey towards general AI:
Excited to share our new generative model! #VideoPixelNetworks predict detailed future video frames…
#DeepMind software engineer @dominikgrewe was speaking at #GTC16EU yesterday about deep reinforcement learning & Al…
#DeepMind’s @demishassabis on-stage at @RSAEvents explaining how AI can help solve the world's biggest challenges.…
BBC News: "Google, Facebook, Amazon join forces on future of AI." Read here  #PAI
#DeepMind founder @demishassabis on-stage at @RAEngNews giving the annual #autumnlecture. Stay tuned over the comin…
Observations from musician & scientist @osageev - 'Human learning what WaveNet learned from humans'
#DeepMind Research Scientist @irinavlh was at #NSLive today talking about recent trends in machine learning…
#DeepMind co-founder @mustafasuleymn spoke at #FutureFest16 this weekend:  Thanks @futurefest for a great event!
Welcoming @UNICEFinnovate to #DeepMind today to hear about tech-driven education initiatives
Excited to share our latest research on speech and music generation! Hear our #WaveNets speak for themselves:
Our cofounder @mustafasuleymn spoke at #Expo16NHS about our mobile platform to support NHS nurses & doctors. Watch:
DeepMind's @demishassabis named as one of London's most influential people for second consecutive year #progress1000
#ICML2016 videos are up, check out David Silver's overview of Deep Reinforcement Learning including #AlphaGo
New blog post up, explaining our paper Decoupling Neural Networks Using Synthetic Gradients!
We had 20 papers accepted at #NIPS2016! Congrats to the team! See our publications page for the pdfs as they go live
Just out: our new paper unlocks neural nets by removing the dependency on backpropagation using Synthetic Gradients!
"The potential of AlphaGo's learnings is 'incredible'" #CannesLions #AlphaGo
#DeepMind's #AlphaGo wins #CannesLions Grand Prix Award for Innovation!
#DeepMind Team win 2 of 3 best paper awards at #icml2016! Congrats to all!
Brain-inspired techniques make unsupervised models discover interpretable visual concepts!
The new #DeepMind blog page is live! First post is on Deep Reinforcement Learning by Dave Silver:
New paper: principled and elegant approach that allows transfer to be seamlessly integrated within the RL framework
PixelCNN 2.0: New state of the art generative model for conditional natural image synthesis
Our new STRAW network learns temporally abstracted macro-actions end-to-end!
Now on arXiv: Progressive Neural Nets, a new approach for continual and transfer learning in Deep RL!
Latest #DeepMind RL paper: Brain-inspired one-shot reinforcement learning, 10x faster in Atari and 3D #Labyrinth
New DeepMind paper: Stop hand-engineering optimization algorithms for deep learning. Learn them instead!
Does the brain do deep learning and what does that mean for neuroscience? Preprint with @kordinglab @AdamMarblestone
Our latest paper, Optimal BPTT policies for scarce memory setting when training RNNs. Run out of GPU memory no more!
Our latest results on safe and efficient off-policy reinforcement learning are out!
#DeepMind Neuroscience team published a great paper in Neuron on how the brain does hierarchical planning (+video):
Scott did an awesome presentation of his paper NPI with @NandoDF at #ICLR2016 picking up the award for best paper!
#ICLR2016 starts tomorrow, #DeepMind had 13 great papers accepted! Check them all out here:
